sent.orig: Results: ISO prolonged APD,urged EAD,delayed DAD and triggered activity, and increased ICa-L and IKI.
sent.trans: 结果：ISO延长动作电位时程(APD),诱发早期后除极(EAD),延迟后除极(DAD)及触发激动，增加L型-钙电流(I_(Ca-L))及I_(K1)。

sent.orig: Dad had played hide-and-with you for many times, but every time you could find Dad lastly.
sent.trans: 爸爸和你玩了好多次捉迷藏，每次都一下子就被你找出来。不过这一次，爸爸决定躲好久好久。

sent.orig: On Thursday January 6th, Dad drove to work. Dad drives to work everyday.
sent.trans: 一月六日星期四，爸爸开车去上班。爸爸每天开车去上班。

sent.orig: I can open this letter and find out if my dad is really my dad.
sent.trans: 我可以打开这封信并知道我的父亲是不是生我的那个人。

sent.orig: My educated dad was devastated. Rich dad congratulated me.
sent.trans: 对此我受过良好教育的爸爸非常伤心，富爸爸则祝贺我。
